note.p: Career: Designed Bishop's Rock Lighthouse, Scilly Isles
Memberships: FRSE; MICE (President 1834-1845); Honorary Associate, Institution of Naval Architects
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1862-1863 vol 12 pp lxiv-lxvi
References: Denis Smith, in Transactions of the Newcomen Society 1987-1998 vol 69, no 1, pp 23-55
Institute of Civil Engineering Minutes of Proceedings 1862-1863 vol 22 (obituary)
Transactions of the Institution of Naval Architects 1862 vol 3 pp xxv-xxvi (obituary)
